advertisement

The mens lacrosse season is right around the corner PERIOD

Across the East Coast coaches are preparing for the upcoming season which officially gets in full swing this weekend PERIOD

At Syracuse Orangemen coach John Desko takes over the reins of a program that lost two vital members of the team that went to the NCAA Tournament semifinals PERIOD After his team had dropped an  heartbreaker to eventual champion Princeton former coach Roy Simmons Jr PERIOD dropped the bombshell  that game was his last PERIOD

His retirement ended Simmons reign over Orangemen lacrosse PERIOD Simmons had replaced his father Roy Sr. who had coached the squad from  PERIOD

Furthermore Syracuse which finished last season No PERIOD  with a  mark will be without Player of the Year Casey Powell PERIOD The attacker was the first pick in the National Lacrosse League Draft and is playing for the Rochester Knighthawks this season PERIOD He finished last season leading the nation in points tallying  goals and assisting on  others PERIOD His brother Ryan finished second in the nation as a sophomore with  goals and  assists PERIOD

 Desko said PERIOD 

The real Thiel

With Simmons abdication Penn State coach Glenn Thiel is now fourth among active Div PERIOD I coaches in victories ninth on the alltime list PERIOD

 said Thiel who enters his thirty-first season as a coach twenty-first at Penn State PERIOD 

Scheduling matters

Penn State enters this season with the sixthmost difficult schedule in the nation as ranked by LaxPower.com PERIOD

The schedule proves to be difficult but not as tough as last year when Penn State played and lost to Princeton as opposed to Lehigh which the Nittany Lions will go against March  PERIOD

 Thiel said PERIOD 

The NCAA Tournaments selection committee comprised of coaches and NCAA officials considers a teams strength of schedule power points and results of teams it has beaten when determining which teams will make the playoffs PERIOD

Tigers walking on paper feet

If Bill Tierney has any thoughts of a fourpeat hed better think again PERIOD

The Princeton coach has lost his triumvirate attack unit  Chris Massey Jon Hess and Jesse Hubbarb  to graduation PERIOD

 Tierney said PERIOD

Tierney gives the championship edge to Loyola and Duke which Penn State faces in its last game of the season PERIOD

Said Tierney
